name: Another Oasis
description:
Have you every wanted to play a short, puzzle platformer? If so then Another Oasis is the game for you!

Another Oasis is a 2D puzzle platformer where you explore a desert and overcome puzzles!

This game is a MVP (Minimum viable product) of a game that I was working on a while ago so I decided to release it! This game is no longer in development

Recommended specs:

Processor: Intel core i5-2400

GPU: Nvidia GT 710

RAM: 4GB
